### 1.1
```{r}
library (tidyverse)
df1 <- read.csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agricolamz/2018_data_analysis_for_linguists/master/data/students/dkbrz/hw1_agreement/hw1_1_zilo_class.csv", encoding = 'UTF-8')
as_tibble(df1)%>%
  group_by(stimulus_source) %>% 
  summarise(n = n())
```
